content: Hi all - especially my EHR vendor friends. Does anyone use the PriorityCode element in the (entryRelationship>observation) off of the Encounter entry in a CCDA when specifying a diagnoses and when it is an ambulatory/outpatient encounter, i.e. 99213? If you do, what values do you use for the coded data - SNOMED codes for Primary, secondary, principal, etc. ThanQ in advance.
